<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 338 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Atreia](/Deities.aspx?ID=101), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=215), [Folgrit](/Deities.aspx?ID=87), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=9), [Milani](/Deities.aspx?ID=43), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126), [Sorrow's Sword](/Deities.aspx?ID=249), [The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=198)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You wreathe yourself in ghostly flames, gaining cold resistance 5. Additionally, adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch you or hit you with an unarmed attack, take 2d6 fire damage each time they do.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The cold resistance increases by 5, and the fire damage increases by 1d6.
name: Fire Shield
